title: Revival/Return from the Grave - Novel Updates
tags: Death   Death of Loved Ones   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Immortals   Jealousy   Oneshot   Possession   Smart Couple   Souls   Tragic Past   Transmigration   Unconditional Love
author: Wu Yan Se   无颜色
description: I am about to die, my only wish is to close my eyes and join the grave. But, that shameful woman unexpectedly seized my body and my husband/lord. Why is it her? Why is it her? I am unsatisfied… I am unwilling…>
